comments:
Hi,

I'm sometimes unable to run a Java program on the first attemp.
Scenario:
 - I start up 
JBoss
 - try to start up the test client and that fails

*** Bug 17937 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Not clear how launch config history is being corrupted, but the persitence code 
now guards against null entries.
